bug.author: richardliaw
bug.summary: [docs] Development and Contribution pages are very out of date
bug.description: Reducing the barrier to contribution would help a lot of people get started. Right now, not only are the "development" pages hard to find, they're also out of date.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/richardliaw>@richardliaw</denchmark-link> Can I close this? I think you made changes to fix this issue? Please reopen if it wasn't addressed yet.
